name: Cult Clique
description:
Made for the Snappy Gurus Game Off, this clicker game sets out to explore cult recruitment and pyramid schemes through the lense of endless clicking. The deeper down the rabbit hole, the more unsettling and underhand the cult becomes.

Made in ~5 days.

Made by:

Marcus Moore - Programming and Art

Adrian (Ax) De Luna - Lead Writer

Christopher Moore - Music

Silver - Additional Support
